net.hudup.logistic.math

Class BitProbItemMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.logistic.math.BitProbItemMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BitProbItemMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is matrix of AND probabilities of binary items, in which each cell is a pair of AND probability between two binary items. This matrix is called binary probability matrix or bit probability matrix.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • bitItemMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Pair> bitItemMap
        Items are translated into bit items. For example: item 1 with rating 4 is translated into 9. So each key (like 9) is the bit item id and each value is a pair of real item id (like 1) and real rating value (like 4).

      • matrix

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double>> matrix
        Main matrix of AND probabilities of binary items.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BitProbItemMatrix

        public BitProbItemMatrix()
        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public double get(int bitRowId,
                  int bitColId)
        Getting AND probability at bit row ID and bit column ID. Note, both bit row ID and bit column ID are bit item id. Please call method contains(int, int) before calling this method. If method contains(int, int) returns false, the probability does not exist.
        Parameters:
        bitRowId - bit row ID.
        bitColId - bit column ID.
        Returns:
        AND probability at bit row ID and bit column ID.

      • get

        public double get(int bitId)
        Getting AND probability at bit item ID. Please call method contains(int, int) before calling this method. If method contains(int, int) returns false, the probability does not exist.
        Parameters:
        bitId - bit item ID.
        Returns:
        probability (AND probability) at bit ID.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int bitRowId,
                        int bitColId)
        Checking whether AND probability matrix contains bit row id and bit column id. Note, both bit row ID and bit column ID are bit item id.
        Parameters:
        bitRowId - bit row id.
        bitColId - bit column id.
        Returns:
        whether AND probability matrix contains bit row id and bit column id.

      • setup

        public void setup(BitData bitData)
        Setting up (creating) this probabilities matrix from binary data.
        Parameters:
        bitData - binary data.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clearing this matrix.

      • bitIds

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> bitIds()
        Getting binary item identifiers.
        Returns:
        set of bit id (s).

      • getPair

        public Pair getPair(int bitId)
        Getting the original pair (real item id and real rating value) of a bit item id. For example: item 1 with rating 4 is translated into 9. So each key (like 9) is the bit item id and each value is a pair of real item id (like 1) and real rating value (like 4).
        Parameters:
        bitId - bit item id.
        Returns:
        original pair (real item id and real rating value) of a bit item id.

      • transferBitItemMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Pair> transferBitItemMap()
        Transferring (getting) map of bit item identifiers.
        Returns:
        map of map of bit item identifiers (map of pairs). For example: item 1 with rating 4 is translated into 9. So each key (like 9) is the bit item id and each value is a pair of real item id (like 1) and real rating value (like 4).

      • findBitItemIdOf

        public int findBitItemIdOf(int realItemId,
                           double rating)
        Finding bit item id of given pair of real item id and real rating value.
        Parameters:
        realItemId - real item id.
        rating - real rating value.
        Returns:
        bit item id of given pair of real item id and real rating value.
